title: Why Coffee Fuels Developers
summary: Explore how coffee became a developer’s unofficial power-up — from late-night coding to remote work rituals.
author: Dean

body.raw: From pour-over to espresso, developers and caffeine go hand-in-hand. Coffee isn't just about alertness — it's ritual, community, and sometimes a stand-in for debugging.
